gig init
stdout 'Initialized empty Git repository in .git'

! gig commit -m 'this commit should not happen'
stderr 'nothing to commit'

gig add hello.txt
gig commit -m 'add hello.txt'

cp hello2.txt hello.txt
! gig commit -m 'update message'
stderr 'nothing to commit'

gig add hello.txt
gig commit -m 'update message'

-- hello.txt --
hello world

-- hello2.txt --
Hello, 世界
